product_name: Zoot Performance Tri Team Shorts - Women's
long_description: With performance fabric and a snug, stay-put fit, the women's Zoot Performance Tri Team Shorts have everything you need to give it your all on race day or during your toughest training sessions. Snug stretch-polyester fabric offers increased muscle support to help reduce muscle fatigue; 4-way stretch allows unrestricted range of motion. Built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays; flatlock seams reduce chafing and irritation. Lightweight polyester fleece chamois adds comfort in the saddle without bulk; chamois is odor-resistant and won't soak up water during the swim portion. 2 integrated side pockets stow energy gels, ID or other small essentials. The women's Zoot Performance Tri Team Shorts offer a next-to-skin fit; elastic waistband with internal drawcord provides a secure fit.
short_description: With performance fabric and a snug, stay-put fit, the women's Zoot Performance Tri Team Shorts have everything you need to give it your all on race day or during your toughest training sessions.
